Package com.ben12.reta.beans.constraints

Annotation Interface PathExists

@Target({METHOD,FIELD,ANNOTATION_TYPE,CONSTRUCTOR,PARAMETER}) @Retention(RUNTIME) @Documented @Constraint(validatedBy=PathExistsValidator.class) public @interface PathExists
